meanings.definition: Engaging in violent or destructive behavior
meanings.sent1: The rampageous lion scared all the animals in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The bear became rampageous when it felt threatened.
meanings.sent3: The rampageous toddler knocked over all the blocks in a fit of anger.
meanings.sent4: Her rampageous temper was like a storm, destroying everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The rampageous storm tore through the town, leaving chaos behind.

meanings.sent1: The rampageous dog barked fiercely at anyone who approached.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's rampageous determination led him to victory.
meanings.sent3: The rampageous waves crashed against the shore with great force.
meanings.sent4: His rampageous ambition drove him to achieve his goals at any cost.
meanings.sent5: The rampageous wind howled through the night, shaking the windows.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a rampage or violent outburst
meanings.sent1: The rampageous mob caused chaos in the streets.
meanings.sent2: The rampageous crowd broke through the barriers in a frenzy.
meanings.sent3: The rampageous party guests danced wildly into the night.
meanings.sent4: Her rampageous laughter echoed through the room, infectious to all.
meanings.sent5: The rampageous fire spread quickly, engulfing everything in its path.
